nodes.text: Michael Manley is an artist who illustrated two of the Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game supplements, as well as the doomed Lightsaber Dueling Pack. He also composed the sketches for Tales of the Bounty Hunters; and along with Al Williamson and Aaron McClellan, he provided the sketches for Tales from the Mos Eisley Cantina and Tales from Jabba's Palace.
